messages.message:
Document image preview loading is very very slow on ib.com (http://ib.com) today. Impacting customer demos in that env (switching to demo.instabase.com (http://demo.instabase.com) where i can for now)
Are there any known issues in the environment?
@Matt Weaver can you share the document that you’re trying to access…
I tried to open a document (~1 MB in size), which was fast (2-3 seconds to render)…

From instabase.com (http://instabase.com) file service stats  as well, i can see all (99%) requests returning within 1 second… We can hop on a quick call to see if you’re still facing slowness and debug this?
This ibflowresults specifically is very slow
the same binary run on the same document in demo.instabase.com (http://demo.instabase.com) loads in 2 seconds, but is not done loading after 30s in instabase.com (http://instabase.com)
and loading each record in the doc takes longer
Strange, this seems to be loading fine for me… Can you try clearing cache and hard refresh maybe?

That has helped a bit, but some thumbnails don't load until i've opened the doc in full screen mode.
this may be a flow review issue CC @Kerry @Eric Han
hmm, that is very strange, i’ll give it a test now. we didn’t change anything in prod :thinking_face:
Could be jobservice communication with dbs if file service is looking normal?
Should we make write_thumbnail yes by default?
yes already did for flow v3 :smile: https://github.com/instabase/instabase/pull/21402 we’ll have an updated default OCR configs in the September release
